name: Postcard
lore:
&7When placed on your island, it will
&7inspire your minions with the belief
&7that they too, might one day be given
&7the choice to leave if they work
&7hard enough.

&7&aAll minions on your island will work &b5%
&b&afaster.

&7&8''Your minion sent you a stunning''
&8''image featuring a stunning image of a''
&8''towering mountain on a very, very''
&8''distant island.''

&6&lLEGENDARY&r
